high_descs: Pick up the green rag below the window.
Move over to the small table left of the bed.
Turn on the light on the table.
Turn right and walk towards the door, then hang a left and walk up to the window.
Pick up the green rag off of the ground.
Turn around and walk over to the far wall, then hang a right and head up to the small wooden end table with the lamp and digital alarm clock on it.
Turn on the small lamp that is on the wooden end table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a green rag in the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Walk to the window on your right.
Pick up the green rag from the ground below the window.
Turn around and walk to the nightstand to the left of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the nightstand while carrying a green rag.

high_descs: Head to the window that is in front of you to the right.
Pick up the green cloth that is directly below the window
Turn around and walk forward until you get to the wall then turn right and continue walking until you get to the night stand
Turn on the lamp that is on the night stand
anns.task_desc: Pick up cloth and turn on a lamp
